snippet: Mayor Thomas M. Menino of Boston did not intend to cause offense when he recently told The New York Times that if he were in Detroit, he’d “blow up the place and start all over.”
abstract: Spokesman for Boston Mayor Thomas M Menino says he did not intend to cause offense when he told The New York Times that if he were in Detroit, he would 'blow up the place and start all over.'
lead_paragraph: Mayor Thomas M. Menino of Boston did not intend to cause offense when he recently told The New York Times that if he were in Detroit, he’d “blow up the place and start all over.”
